content:
I have the same issues as question @285 posted earlier. I passed all the test cases in the tester but got a 38% from the auto grader. I would understand if I missed a few points, but with so little information from the auto grader output, I have no idea what I did wrong. Is there a way to get a manual regrade? Or help with explaining why I failed so many auto grader tests and not tester cases?

Thank you in advance.
subject: Issues with PSET 4 Autograder

content:
@Kuan Wei Huang I'm going to tag you in a bunch of these, but I'll explain what the issue is here

One student in office hours explained that she thinks her load_data function is wrong, she only loaded in the closing prices and not the opening prices. Since the local tester only checked for the closing prices, this was misleading. I think that points should be awarded back for this since the docstrings were inconsistent, and seemingly a lot of students had this issue. Not sure if it's the exact issue for this student, but a lot of them with very low scores on the autograder probably have some similar issue.eatshirt
Sure will take a look. What's your kerb?
